label: Define Node
description: Defines a node for publishing velocity commands to a robot for teleoperation.

label: Subscribe to Sensor Data
description: Subscribes to sensor topics like laser scan or camera for feedback during teleoperation.

label: Set Teleoperation Control
description: Publishes joystick input for controlling linear and angular velocities.

label: Set Parameters
description: Sets operational parameters for teleoperation, like max speed or angular velocity limits.

label: Control Status
description: Publishes the status of teleoperation controls, including active state and errors.

label: Request Robot Pose
description: Subscribes to the robot pose topic for localization feedback.

label: Emergency Stop
description: Sends an emergency stop command to the robot for safety during teleoperations.

label: Robot Arm Controls
description: Publishes control commands for a robot arm in teleoperation.

label: Camera Feed Subscription
description: Subscribes to the camera feed for live video during teleoperation.

label: Joystick Input
description: Publishes joystick input for robot teleoperation control.

label: Path Planning Nodes
description: Publishes waypoints for path planning during teleoperations.

label: Subscribe to Battery Status
description: Monitors battery status to ensure adequate power for teleoperations.

label: Multi-Robot Communication
description: Facilitates communication between multiple robots for coordinated teleoperations.

label: Set Obstacle Avoidance
description: Activates or deactivates obstacle avoidance features during teleoperations.

label: Log Data
description: Publishes log data for debugging or analysis of teleoperation activities.

label: Gripper Control
description: Publishes gripper control commands for teleoperation tasks.

label: Safety Zones
description: Subscribes to safety zone information to prevent collisions.

label: Subscribe to Temperature
description: Monitors robot temperature during teleoperation to avoid overheating.

label: Audio Commands
description: Publishes audio commands for teleoperations or interactions.

label: Sensor Fusion
description: Subscribes to sensor fusion data for better environment perception during teleoperations.
